name: Songbird Mansion
description: The house is welcoming from the open door to the wide hallway. Under the lamp-shine it is nature's art, something that soothes right to the soul.

name: Marshmour Estate
description: The house, with its many eyes so wide, takes in the verdant view, adorned with the dreamy colors of sunset.

name: Hazelfield Residence
description: The house stands upon strong foundations, with bricks mortared together with loving hands.

name: Springriver Villa
description: Through the large arched windows light flows through all seasons, gracing the air without favour, illuminating the sweet-toffee browns of the wooden floor.

name: Summergrove Mansion
description: The haunted house keeps its ghosts for the same reason people keep a strong dog, to guard and to love, to ease the lonely hours.

name: Noble Palm Residence
description: The house that has witnessed so many seasons is always wise enough to celebrate the sunny ones.

name: Foxpard Residence
description: Upon that summer day the house upon the hill is a pastel congregation of sweet hues, windows letting the fresh air flow in, doors opening to friends and kin.

name: Remthall Estate
description: All concrete and tall glass windows that give a view of the mountains, a chance to relax and take in the changing of the seasons from the comfort of an easy chair.

name: Graceville Estate
description: Those bricks were laid one at a time, perhaps on a fine spring day. Let your eyes wander the roughness and how each is so very straight. This house was made with love, that's for sure.

name: Calding Estate
description: The house is a kaleidoscope of memories, of photographs adorning the walls, each of them conjuring the emotions of those sweet eternal moments.

name: Rothsbarry Chateau
description: The house born of an architect's plan lived and breathed upon the rock, foundations perfectly sound, all set to stand for generations to come.

name: Sinnon Manor
description: To the mountains in their timeless grace the manor house is but a spring flower in momentary bloom.
